<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/agreements/versions/{agreement-version-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the specified agreement version. Successful request will return an [Agreement Version Object](/restapi/docs/schemas/agreement-version-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"agreement-version-id","in":"path","description":"Agreement Version ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
